show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #30 Kevin Silverman takes a Deep Dive into Carbon Credits
subtitle: #30 Kevin Silverman takes a Deep Dive into Carbon Credits
summary:
Kevin Silverman from Grassroots Carbon Joins us to take a deep dive into Carbon credits and how they relate to Farming and Ranching.
On the show we decode and define a lot of the terms being thrown around in the media.

Kevin@buildgrassroots.com  Email

Soilcarbon.substack.com

https://weekly.regeneration.works/
